amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, $2,000,000 to conduct a demonstration of a prototype of the Improved Shipboard Combat Information Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3506 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3506 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S7375; text: CR S7375) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Navy, $2,000,000 to conduct a demonstration of a prototype of the Improved Shipboard Combat Information Center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3506 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3506 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reed.
